for _ in range(input()):
	n,q=map(int,raw_input().split())
	a=[]
	for _ in range(n):
		ts,te=map(int,raw_input().split())
		if ts>te:
			ts,te=te,ts
		a.append([ts,te])
	for _ in range(q):
		b=int(input())
		flag=1
		for j in range(n):
			if b>=a[j][0] and b<=a[j][1]:
				flag=0
				break;
		if not flag:
			print 'NO'
		else:
			print 'YES'
